title: Ribbon, ca. 1805
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: plain and satin weave
creditline: Gift of Herman A. Elsberg on the Fortieth Anniversary of the Museum
description: Ivory ribbon of the same design as 1937-63-17. Alternate wavy bands of satin and plain cloth weave. Scalloped edges.
